arts.ttl: “Willing to accept” | West Ham open to selling star if the price is right
arts.sum: West Ham are open to selling one of their star player to their rivals for a massive fee this January. A woeful performance against the worst team in the league, Southampton, solidified that some players are either not playing for Julen Lopetegui, or simply not good enough. arts.ttl: West Ham GK Fabianski 'alert' after scary collision
arts.sum: West Ham United manager Julen Lopetegui said goalkeeper Lukasz Fabianski is "alert" and conscious after being stretchered off during their win at Southampton.

arts.ttl: West Ham United interested in La Liga midfielder with €60m asking price
arts.sum: Real Sociedad have regularly had to deal with their players attracting a lot of interest from many different clubs. They parted ways with Robin Le Normand (Atletico Madrid) and Mikel Merino (Arsenal) during the summer, and it would be no surprise if they were to lose more big-hitters in 2025. Martin Zubimendi has been strongly […] The post West Ham United interested in La Liga midfielder with €60m asking price appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Liverpool, Arne Slot receive blessing in disguise as 24-year-old suspended for West Ham game
arts.sum: Liverpool midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai will miss Sunday's Premier League clash with West Ham United after picking up a yellow card against Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Lukasz Fabianski injury update after Aaron Ramsdale checks on West Ham goalkeeper
arts.sum: Lukasz Fabianski initially looked in a bad way after a challenge by Mark Wood as he was given oxygen before being stretchered off - and fellow keeper Aaron Ramsdale was given plaudits for rushing over to check on him

arts.ttl: Jarrod Bowen extends West Ham’s unbeaten run to four matches at Southampton
arts.sum: Hammers goalkeeper Lukasz Fabianski suffered a nasty first-half blow which saw him leave the pitch on a stretcher.

arts.ttl: Premier League release second VAR statement after red card overturned
arts.sum: The Premier League have released a statement to explain why West Ham midfielder Guido Rodriguez saw his straight red card reduced to a yellow following a VAR review during their clash with Southampton on Boxing Day

arts.ttl: West Ham have ‘shown interest’ in striker – Club forced to sell due to financial issues
arts.sum: West Ham’s Michail Antonio will be out of action for around a year due to his car accident earlier this month. The 34-year-old’s absence will leave the Hammers with just one striker option in Niklas Fullkrug, but the German hasn’t quite made a mark in London due to injury. arts.ttl: “Surely” | Early Team News | Southampton vs West Ham
arts.sum: West Ham face rock bottom Southampton today in a game that is surely a must-win for Julen Lopetegui. The Head Coach has been under increasing pressure this season, following what has been a poor campaign thus far under the Spaniard, as the club look more set for a place firmly within the bottom half of... arts.ttl: Mohammed Kudus set surprising new target amid £85m January transfer links
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus is being linked with a move to Manchester City but West Ham head coach Julen Lopetegui is calling on the Ghana star to focus more on his defensive work
